main event: A sighting of a saucer-shaped object was reported in San Juan, Puerto Rico on June 2, 1954.
interesting points: The object was red-orange in color and approximately half-dollar size,The sighting lasted for 7 minutes during which the object climbed rapidly and hovered,The observer initially mistook the object for the moon before realizing it was moving,The object made a 90-degree turn and sped away,The report suggests the possibility of the observed object being a balloon but discounts it based on observed behavior.
witness description: A family traveling in a car, including the father, sister, and the main observer who was determined and alert.
